definition: to fish with a hook and bait
spoon/ladle/CL:把[ba3]/abbr. for 公勺[gong1 shao2], centiliter (unit of volume)
to fish (with line and hook)/to dupe
Diaoyu Islands, claimed by China but controlled by Japan as the Senkaku Islands, also called the Pinnacle Islands
Diaoyu Islands, located between Taiwan and Okinawa, controlled by Japan – which calls them the Senkaku Islands – but claimed by China as part of its territory
to angle for fame (idiom)/to fish for compliments
use a long line to catch a big fish (idiom); a long-term plan for major returns
pinyin: fang4 chang2 xian4 diao4 da4 yu2

definition: lit. sitting at ease in a fishing boat despite wind and storm (idiom); to stay calm during tense situation/a cool head in a crisis
pinyin: ren4 ping2 feng1 lang4 qi3 , wen3 zuo4 diao4 yu2 tai2
containing_words.word: 任凭风浪起，稳坐钓鱼台

definition: Jiang Ziya is fishing, if you want take the hook (idiom, refers to early sage 姜子牙 fishing with no bait and the hook above the water); to put one's head in the noose
pinyin: tai4 gong1 diao4 yu2 , yuan4 zhe3 shang4 gou1

definition: Jiang Ziya is fishing, if you want it, take the hook (idiom, refers to early sage 姜子牙 fishing with no bait and the hook above the water); to put one's head in the noose
pinyin: Jiang1 tai4 gong1 diao4 yu2 , yuan4 zhe3 shang4 gou1

definition: lit. sitting at ease in a fishing boat despite storms (idiom); to stay calm during tense situation/a cool head in a crisis
(slang) (of women) to hunt for rich, attractive guys

sentences.english: In fact, I usually don't catch anything.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，我通常什么都钓不上来。

sentences.english: It is difficult for those who only have small fish and shrimp 1 in their minds to catch a big fish.
sentences.chinese: 而那些眼中只有小鱼小虾的人，要想钓着大鱼就难了。

sentences.english: You should catch at least two mackerels.
Do you want to learn how to fly-fish for tarpon in the 1)Gulf of Mexico?
sentences.chinese: 想不想到墨西哥湾学习用假蝇钓大海鲢？

sentences.english: I can reach him with the gaff and eat him here in comfort.
sentences.chinese: 我可以用鱼钩把它钓过来，在这儿舒舒服服地吃。

sentences.english: Fishing some sewage rats for dinner?
sentences.chinese: 钓一些下水道的大老鼠作为晚餐？

sentences.english: A friend of mine went last weekend and caught some good-sized fish.
sentences.chinese: 我有一个朋友上个周末去钓鱼，钓了一些很大的鱼。

sentences.english: Most anglers will have desire of being able to fish with fly fishing outfit.
sentences.chinese: 飞绳钓是每个钓鱼人都渴望接触的其中一种钓法。

sentences.english: The month phase is an important factor affecting the fishing efficiency in the squid jigging fisheries.
sentences.chinese: 月相是影响光诱鱿钓作业效率的重要因素之一。

sentences.english: Instead of catching fish, they catch old tires and trash.
sentences.chinese: 他们往往鱼钓不到，却钓上来些旧轮胎和垃圾。

sentences.english: I repeatedly caught several times, or a fish nor.
sentences.chinese: 我反反复复钓了好几次，还是一条鱼也没有。

sentences.english: It is difficult for those who only have small fish and shrimp in their minds to catch a big fish.
sentences.chinese: 而那些眼中只有小鱼小虾的人，要想钓着大鱼就难了。

sentences.english: One of the more overlooked presentations with drop shots is "walking" it along the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 经常被忽略的一种倒钓呈现手法是将饵一路拖晃回来。

sentences.english: The fish I caught was yay big.
I am so glad that Liangliang likes to fish that much.
sentences.chinese: 杰母钓的鱼最大，亮亮钓到很多。

sentences.english: They will go shrimping this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 今天下午他们去钓小虾。

definition: to fish (with line and hook)/to dupe
